There was an experiment in 1967 by Stanley Milgrom who was at Yale on short passing social networks.

This was this was where we got the idea of 6 degrees of separation from he sent a message to somebody in Omaha, NE and ask that person to deliver the message to a stockbroker who lived in Sharon, MA and this person was supposed to send the message.
